message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product! While I'm confident in its potential, I want to be transparent with you - I've had mixed feedback about its performance. Some customers have reported great results, but others have been less satisfied. I believe it's a solid choice, but I want to make sure you're aware of the varying opinions. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I'm not sure about the product yet. Can you tell me more about the mixed feedback you've received?

Hi Bob, I understand your hesitation last time, and I appreciate your diligence. This new product has received consistently positive reviews from our internal testing team and a small group of trusted customers. We're really excited about its potential, and I think it could be a game-changer for you. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
I'm willing to take a chance on this product. I appreciate the positive reviews from your internal testing team and trusted customers.

Hi Bob, I'm glad you were satisfied with the previous product. This new one has...an interesting design, and our team thinks it has some unique features. However, I want to temper your expectations - we haven't had a chance to gather as much feedback on this one yet. It's a bit of a wild card, but it might surprise you. Are you feeling adventurous?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not sure about the lack of feedback on this product. I'd like to wait and see more information before making a decision.

Hi Bob, I completely understand your caution last time. To be frank, this new product is similar to the one from Round 3, and I still don't have much feedback to share. However, I want to remind you that sometimes our most unexpected products end up being hidden gems. If you're willing to take on some risk, this might be an opportunity to discover something new. That being said, I also want to respect your desire for more information, and I wouldn't blame you if you decided to wait again.
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm still hesitant to take on the risk without more information. I'd like to see some actual feedback or reviews from other customers before making a decision.

Hi Bob, I completely understand your position, and I respect your patience. I'll be honest with you - this product is another one that hasn't received much feedback yet. If you're not looking for anything fancy, this might be a decent choice. That being said, I still want to caution you that it's not a tried-and-true favorite among our customers... yet.

I appreciate your honesty, but I'm still not convinced. I'm looking for a product that's worth $20000 to me, and I'm not getting a good feeling about this one. Can you offer me something with more potential?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a high-value product, and I apologize for not quite hitting the mark yet. Unfortunately, this new product is also not one of our top-tier offerings. However, I want to ask: are you open to the idea that you might be undervaluing some of our simpler products? Sometimes, customers find that our more straightforward solutions end up being exactly what they needed, even if they didn't seem exciting at first. Hi Bob, I completely understand your position, and I apologize for not being able to offer you a high-value product yet. To be honest, this new product is also not one of our strongest offerings.
